gameDetails.name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game â€“ Black Panther Hero Pack
gameDetails.description:
As princess of Wakanda, Shuri aided her brother and king, T’Challa, through her genius intellect and talent for invention. When T’Challa was severely injured, Shuri took up the mantle of the Black Panther and became the protector of her homeland in his stead, and now she’s darting into your games of Marvel Champions: The Card Game! With her versatile array of signature upgrades and an adaptable fighting style, Shuri is a potent hero that can take on any foe. Within this hero pack, you will find Black Panther (Shuri), her fifteen signature cards, and a full assortment of Justice cards inviting you to thwart the villains’ schemes. This pack also includes a bonus modular encounter set featuring Joystick of the Thunderbolts!

Anyone looking to take on the agents of A.I.M. will want to add the Black Panther Hero Pack to their collection! This expansion comes with a 40-card pre-built deck, giving you the chance to start playing from the moment you open the box.

—description from the publisher
